snippet: A Swiss lawyer accused of helping American clients conceal millions of dollars in offshore accounts pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit tax fraud in federal court in New York.
abstract: Swiss lawyer Edgar Paltzer, accused of helping American clients conceal millions of dollars in offshore accounts, pleads guilty to conspiracy to commit tax fraud in federal court in New York.
lead_paragraph: A Swiss lawyer accused of helping American clients conceal millions of dollars in offshore accounts pleaded guilty to conspiracy to commit tax fraud in federal court in New York.

headline.main: Swiss Lawyer Pleads Guilty to Conspiracy in Tax Fraud
headline.print_headline: Swiss Lawyer Pleads Guilty To Conspiracy In Tax Fraud
